name: Armagneton
description:
BUG WITH THE LEADERBOARD

Due to a last minute bug, the leaderboard overwrites the name but will update the highest score. You can always screenshot your local score if you want to share it. :)

How to play

Hold the asteroids away form Earth using your giant magnet.

WASD - Control the ship

Tips: Large asteroids move slowly but are harder to pull while small asteroids move faster but are easier to pull.

Description

After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, NASA recruits a giant magnet to save the planet.
